source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH laatstesalesorder
AS (SELECT ProductBK,
           ISNULL(MAX(ConfirmationDate), NULL) dt
    FROM dbo.vwSalesOrderExplsion
    GROUP BY ProductBK),
     aataldagengeleden
AS (SELECT s.ProductBK,
           DATEDIFF(DAY, GETDATE(), s.dt) dagen
    FROM laatstesalesorder s),
     invent
AS (SELECT --[LocationName],
        SUM(PhysicalInventory) PhysicalInventory,
        SUM(inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity) PhysicalReservedQuantity,
        SUM(inv.OnOrderQuantity) OnOrderQuantity,
        inv.DimProductBK
    FROM [dwh].FactAvailableQuantity inv
        LEFT JOIN dwh.DimLocation
            ON LocationBK = inv.DimLocationBK
    WHERE LocationID = 'EIN' AND inv.InventStatus='available'
    GROUP BY inv.DimProductBK),

	InventCompleet AS (
--		sELECT * FROM invent WHERE  invent.DimProductBK LIKE 'WNL-04-F04V%'
SELECT --[LocationName],
    SUM(PhysicalInventory) voorraad,
    SUM(inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity) reserved,
    SUM(inv.OnOrderQuantity) onorder,
    ISNULL(MAX(dagen), -5000) AS dagen,
    pr.ProductNumber,
    STRING_AGG(pr.ProductLifecycleState, ';') lifecycle
FROM invent inv
    INNER JOIN dwh.DimProduct pr
        ON inv.DimProductBK = pr.ProductBK
    LEFT JOIN aataldagengeleden d
        ON d.ProductBK = pr.ProductBK
--		LEFT JOIN dwh.DimLocation ON LocationBK=inv.DimLocationBK
WHERE --pr.ProductNumber = 'WNL-04-F04V' AND 
    inv.PhysicalInventory + inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity + inv.OnOrderQuantity <> 0
GROUP BY pr.ProductNumber)

SELECT voorraad =  CAST(inv.voorraad AS INT),
available = CAST(CASE WHEN inv.voorraad-inv.reserved-inv.onorder < 0 THEN 0 ELSE inv.voorraad-inv.reserved-inv.onorder END AS INT),
marker = CASE WHEN (dagen * -1) < 365 THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN inv.lifecycle LIKE '%SP-SR%' THEN '' ELSE 'Y' END END
,inv.ProductNumber, (dagen * -1) dagen, CASE WHEN inv.lifecycle LIKE '%SP-SR%' THEN 'SP-SR' ELSE '' END lifecycle
FROM InventCompleet inv
